snippet: President Hassan Rouhani vowed Saturday to work with the outside world to lift the “oppressive sanctions” crippling Iran’s economy.
abstract: Iran's new Pres Hassan Rouhani vows to work with the outside world to lift sanctions crippling country's economy; receives official backing of Ayatollah Ali Khamenei at a ceremony marking the start of his presidential term; both Rouhani and Khamenei emphasize the economy in their remarks, acknowledgement of toll international economic restrictions connected to country's nuclear program are having on the population.
lead_paragraph: President Hassan Rouhani vowed Saturday to work with the outside world to lift the “oppressive sanctions” crippling Iran’s economy.

headline.main: Iran’s President Puts New Focus on the Economy
headline.print_headline: Iran’s President Puts New Focus On the Economy
